example.eg: Seth always kept his room neat.
example.egtrans: 赛斯总是让自己的房间井井有条。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 整齐的, 整洁的, 井井有条的

example.eg: Kate always looked neat and well dressed.
example.egtrans: 凯特总是衣着整洁，干练精致。

example.eg: Dan was a very neat person and didn't like mess.
example.egtrans: 丹是个爱整洁的人，最受不了脏乱不堪了。

example.eg: Kelsey's neat handwriting was easy to read.
example.egtrans: 凯尔西干净的字迹很容易看懂。

example.eg: My father likes his whiskey neat. He says even ice changes the flavor.
example.egtrans: 我爸爸喜欢喝纯威士忌。他说就算只是冰块也会破坏口感。

example.eg: Larry told a neat story at the party.
example.egtrans: 拉里在派对上讲了个有趣的故事。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 有趣的, 很有意思的, 极棒的

example.eg: She took off her jacket and folded it neat.
example.egtrans: 她脱下夹克，整齐地叠好。

example.eg: Neat! You got the new Lord of the Rings game!
example.egtrans: 太好了！你买到了新出的《魔戒》游戏！

dsense.name: as neat as a pin, as neat as a new pin, like a new pin

trans_examp.trans_cn: 非常整洁, 十分干净
